topics.body:
*looks at news*
Apparently Facebook and a new site called "ello" are having a fight.  Facebook on the one hand are dicks that don't respect people's right to privacy and spend money on anti-glbt bills, politicians and such; on the other hand Ello is controlled by SJW that ban people over those that don't fall into the hivemind.  It's times like these that I'm glad I don't use social media sites.
